cells.data:
First run `catkin_init_workspace` under `src/`
Then, `cd ../` into top level folder, 

Note: On Tesla, had to install joint_state_controller 
`sudo apt install ros-kinetic-joint-state-controller`

run `catkin_make`
run `source devel/setup.bash`


# To get the cyberglove working

`sudo rosrun my_cyberglove start_connection.py`
this will give an error, then run `rosrun my_cyberglove start_connection.py`
`sudo chmod 777 /dev/rfcomm0`. This only needs to be run once on a new computer

`roslaunch my_cyberglove start_pipeline.launch visualize:=False`
